Reversal of synapomorphy 5 of node 205. Paralleled in node 272 and    in <i>Bramocharax bransfordii</i>, <i>Deuterodon iguape</i>, and <i>Lonchogenys    ilisha</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Canal    of lateral line on caudal-fin membrane (92): (1 &gt; 0) absent. Reversal of    synapomorphy 3 of the Characidae. Paralleled in the Aphyoditeinae and <i>Bryconops</i>    clade, in nodes 227, 229, 244, 294 and 298, and in <i>Aphyocharax nattereri</i>,    <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>, <i>B</i>. <i>thomasi</i>, <i>Charax stenopterus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon anisitsi</i>, <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, and <i>Phenacogaster    tegatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 290: (44    / 89 / 22 / 4)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genera <i>Petitella</i>?    and <i>Thayeria</i>; <i>Hemigrammus bleheri</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>rhodostomus</i>?,    other <i>Hemigrammus</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">The relationship    between <i>Hemigrammus bleheri</i> and <i>Thayeria</i> was not proposed prior    to Mirande (2009). As noted above, the species of <i>Thayeria</i> should be    transferred to <i>Hemigrammus</i> under the present hypothesis of relationships.    <i>Petitella georgiae</i> and <i>Hemigrammus rhodostomus</i> share with <i>H</i>.    <i>bleheri</i> a presumably derived coloration; an intense red head and the    caudal fin transversed by black and white markings. These species are, therefore,    tentatively included in this clade. The monotypic genus <i>Petitella</i> was    not analyzed here; however, if it were included in this node it should also    be transferred to <i>Hemigrammus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Position    of coronomeckelian (110): (0 &gt; 1) situated mainly dorsal to Meckelian cartilage.    Reversal of synapomorphy 2 of node 206. Paralleled in nodes 200 and 282 and    in <i>Hemigrammus erythrozonus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Number    of maxillary teeth (135): (1 &gt; 0) only one, or absent. Paralleled in the    <i>Astyanax</i> clade, in node 284, and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>, <i>Cheirodon    interruptus</i>, <i>Coptobrycon bilineatus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon bifasciatus</i>,    and <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hasemania nana</i>,    <i>Paracheirodon axelrodi</i>, and <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Number    of branched anal-fin rays (287): (1 &gt; 0) 17 or less. Reversal of synapomorphy    6 of the Characoidea. Paralleled in the Alestidae, in node 280, and in <i>Attonitus    ephimeros</i> and <i>Prodontocharax melanotus</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in    <i>Hasemania nana</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphy    of <i>Hemigrammus bleheri</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Form    of teeth of inner premaxillary tooth row (128): (0 &gt; 1) with cusps aligned    in straight series and without anterior concavity. Paralleled in the Rhoadsiinae,    in nodes 195, 245, and 280, and in <i>Odontostoechus lethostigmus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 301: (100    / 100 / 92 / 43)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genus <i>Thayeria</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">As previously exposed,    according to the hypothesis of relationships proposed herein, <i>Thayeria</i>    should be transferred to <i>Hemigrammus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Base    of second pectoral ray (231): (1 &gt; 0) large and partially overlapping base    of first pectoral ray from medial view. Paralleled in node 164 and in <i>Moenkhausia    dichroura</i>, <i>Prionobrama paraguayensis</i>, and <i>Tetragonopterus argenteus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Position    of ventral margin of posttemporal (252): (1 &gt; 0) anterior to lateral margin    of epioccipital. Paralleled in nodes 162 and 285 and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>,    <i>Creagrutus anary</i>, <i>Diapoma speculiferum</i>, <i>Moenkhausia</i> cf.    <i>intermedia</i>, and <i>Pyrrhulina australis</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in    node 247 and in <i>Knodus breviceps</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Bony    hooks on fin rays (307): (1 &gt; 0) absent. Paralleled in the Gymnocharacinae,    in nodes 207, 283, and 297, and in <i>Astyanax paris</i>, <i>Bryconamericus    mennii</i>, <i>Exodon paradoxus</i>, <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, <i>Pseudochalceus    kyburzi</i>, and <i>Rhoadsia altipinna</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hasemania    nana</i> and <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Color    of caudal-fin lobes (345): (0 &gt; 2) ventral lobe dark brown or black and dorsal    lobe hyaline. Paralleled in <i>Hemiodus</i> cf. <i>thayeria</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Thayeria obliqua</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Form    of anterior expansion of basihyal (191): (0 &gt; 1) expanded, with anterior    margin with two-thirds or more of its length. Paralleled in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>,    <i>Cyphocharax spilotus</i>, and <i>Prodontocharax melanotus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Development    of transverse process of neural arch of third vertebra (219): (0 &gt; 1) well    developed and extending beyond anterior margin of tripus. Paralleled in node    302, and in <i>Agoniates anchovia</i>, <i>Cyanocharax alburnus</i>, <i>Deuterodon    langei</i>, <i>Engraulisoma taeniatum</i>, <i>Hemiodus</i> cf. <i>thayeria</i>,    and <i>Roeboexodon geryi</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Microschemobrycon    casiquiare</i> and <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Process    of scapula forming anterior border of scapular foramen (244): (0 &gt; 1) absent.    Paralleled in nodes 193 and 252 and in <i>Aphyodite grammica</i>, <i>Deuterodon    langei</i>, <i>Hoplias</i> cf. <i>malabaricus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon herbertaxelrodi</i>,    <i>Leporinus striatus</i>, and <i>Odontostilbe paraguayensis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Dorsal-fin    rays articulating with first dorsal pterygiophore (266): (1 &gt; 0) two. Reversal    of synapomorphy 4 of node 203. Paralleled in <i>Bario steindachneri</i>. Some    trees: Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i> and <i>Paracheirodon axelrodi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphy    of <i>Thayeria boehlkei</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Length    of laterosensory canal of dentary (79): (0 &gt; 1) reduced or absent. Paralleled    in node 279 and in <i>Aphyocharax nattereri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>luetkenii</i>, and <i>Nantis</i>    cf. <i>indefessus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 286: (-4    / 45 / - / 1)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genera <i>Hasemania</i>?,    <i>Hemigrammus</i> (excepting, at least, <i>H</i>. <i>bleheri and H</i>. <i>ulreyi</i>),    <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>, <i>Paracheirodon</i>, <i>Petitella</i>?, and <i>Pristella</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Distance    between cartilage anterior to orbitosphenoid and lateral ethmoids (38): (0 &gt;    1) distant from lateral ethmoids. Reversal of synapomorphy 1 of node 223. Paralleled    in <i>Moenkhausia sanctaefilomenae</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 292: (48    / 76 / 27 / 8)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genus <i>Pristella</i>;    <i>Hemigrammus unilineatus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon amandae</i> G&eacute;ry &amp;    Uj?, <i>H</i>. <i>axelrodi</i> (Travassos)?, <i>H</i>. <i>bentosi</i> Durbin?,    <i>H</i>. <i>copelandi</i> Durbin?, <i>H</i>. <i>compressus</i>?, <i>H</i>.    <i>ecuadoriensis</i> Eigenmann &amp; Henn?, <i>H</i>. <i>eques</i>, <i>H</i>.    <i>erythrostigma</i> (Fowler)?, <i>H</i>. <i>georgettae</i> G&eacute;ry?, <i>H</i>.    <i>haraldschultzi</i> Travassos?, <i>H</i>. <i>hasemani</i> Fowler?, <i>H</i>.    <i>loweae</i> Costa &amp; G&eacute;ry?, <i>H</i>. <i>melasemion</i> Fowler?,    <i>H</i>. <i>micropterus</i> (Eigenmann)?, <i>H</i>. <i>milleri</i> Durbin?,    <i>H</i>. <i>minor</i> Durbin?, <i>H</i>. <i>panamensis</i> Durbin?, <i>H</i>.    <i>pulchripinnis</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>pyrrhonotus</i> Burgess?, <i>H</i>. <i>rosaceus</i>    Durbin?, <i>H</i>. <i>roseus</i> (G&eacute;ry)?, <i>H</i>. <i>simulatus</i>    
(G&eacute;ry)?, <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>sweglesi</i> (G&eacute;ry)?,    <i>H</i>. <i>takasei</i> G&eacute;ry?, <i>H</i>. <i>uruguayensis</i> (Fowler)?,    <i>H</i>. <i>werneri</i> G&eacute;ry &amp; Uj? <i>Moenkhausia hemigrammoides</i>    G&eacute;ry?, and <i>M</i>. <i>pittieri</i> Eigenmann?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">The rosy tetra    clade of Weitzman &amp; Palmer (1997) is putatively composed of <i>Hyphessobrycon    axelrodi</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>bentosi</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>copelandi</i>, <i>H</i>.    <i>eques</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>compressus</i> (the type-species of <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>),    <i>H</i>. <i>ecuadoriensis</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>erythrostigma</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>georgettae</i>,    <i>H</i>. <i>haraldschultzi</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>loweae</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>melasemion</i>,    <i>H</i>. <i>micropterus</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>milleri</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>minor</i>,    <i>H</i>. <i>panamensis</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>pyrrhonotus</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>rosaceus</i>,    <i>H</i>. <i>roseus</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>simulatus</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i>,    <i>H</i>. <i>sweglesi</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>takasei</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>uruguayensis</i>,    and <i>H</i>. <i>werneri</i>. These authors, also listed <i>Hemigrammus unilineatus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon amandae</i>, <i>H</i>. 
<i>hasemani</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>pulchripinnis</i>,    <i>Moenkhausia hemigrammoides</i>, <i>M</i>. <i>pittieri</i>, and <i>Pristella    maxillaris</i> as probable relatives to the rosy tetra clade. Most species of    this node are included in this list of species; although the rosy tetra clade    was based mainly on certain shared coloration patterns, and no phylogenetic    analysis supports its monophyly, the species composing it are listed with question    marks.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Dark    conspicuous spot on dorsal fin (343): (0 &gt; 1) present.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Ventral    extent of third infraorbital (64): (1 &gt; 0) reaching horizontal arm of preopercle.    (k13-14). Reversal of synapomorphy 3 of node 180. Paralleled in the Heterocharacinae    and Iguanodectinae, in nodes 184, 198, 225, and 302, and in <i>Agoniates anchovia</i>,    <i>Brycon pesu</i>, <i>Hasemania nana</i>, <i>Markiana nigripinnis</i>, <i>Moenkhausia    sanctaefilomenae</i>, <i>Pseudochalceus kyburzi</i>, <i>Roeboexodon geryi</i>,    and <i>Stichonodon insignis</i>. Reversed in <i>Hemigrammus unilineatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Pristella maxillaris</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Synchondral    articulation between lateral ethmoid and anterodorsal border of orbitosphenoid    (35): (1 &gt; 0) present. Paralleled in the Aphyocharacinae and in <i>Leporinus    striatus</i>, <i>Mimagoniates rheocharis</i>, and <i>Rhaphiodon vulpinus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Anterior    paired projections of parasphenoid (40): (1 &gt; 0) absent. Some trees: Paralleled    in <i>Hasemania nana</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Anterior    region of third infraorbital (63): (0 &gt; 1) abruptly expanded relative to    posterior region of second infraorbital. Paralleled in node 295.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Dorsal    end of laterosensory canal of preopercle and suprapreopercle (82): (0 &gt; 1)    overlapping anterodorsal process of opercle. Paralleled in the Alestidae, in    node 230, and in <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon eques</i>, <i>Parecbasis    cyclolepis</i>, and <i>Stichonodon insignis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Number    of cusps of anterior maxillary teeth (138): (1 &gt; 0) conical, a single cusp.    Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Aphyodite grammica</i> and <i>Axelrodia lindeae</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>6.</b> Separation    between posterior dentary teeth (147): (0 &gt; 1) more than width of these teeth.    Paralleled in node 221 and in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>rutilus</i> and <i>Aulixidens    eugeniae</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>7.</b> Articulation    between ventral margin of metapterygoid and posterodorsal margin of quadrate    (155): (0 &gt; 1) present. Paralleled in nodes 176 and 299 and in <i>Deuterodon    langei</i>, <i>Heterocharax macrolepis</i>, <i>Roeboides descalvadensis</i>,    and <i>Thoracocharax stellatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>8.</b> Form    and degree of ossification of first ceratobranchial gill rakers (200): (0 &gt;    1) rather thick and completely ossified distal region. Paralleled in nodes 176,    212, and 299 and in <i>Hoplias</i> cf. <i>malabaricus</i> and <i>Prionobrama    paraguayensis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>9.</b> Distribution    of denticles on gill rakers (202): (0 &gt; 1) along entire surface of gill rakers.    Paralleled in node 269 and in <i>Astyanax correntinus</i>, <i>Deuterodon langei</i>,    <i>Hoplias</i> cf. <i>malabaricus</i>, and <i>Hyphessobrycon eques</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>10.</b> Contact    between dorsal margin of <i>adductor mandibulae</i> and ventral margin of <i>dilator    operculi</i> (335): (1 &gt; 0) absent. Paralleled in <i>Creagrutus anary</i>,    <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, <i>Piabucus melanostomus</i>, <i>Prionobrama paraguayensis</i>,    <i>Prodontocharax melanotus</i>, and <i>Pyrrhulina australis</i>. Some trees:    Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 291: (34    / 90 / 0 / 2)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Hemigrammus    unilineatus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon eques</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>pulchripinnis</i>,    <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i>, other <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?, some <i>Moenkhausia</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Among the analyzed    species, in this node is <i>Hemigrammus unilineatus</i> (the type species of    <i>Hemigrammus</i>), <i>Hyphessobrycon eques</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>pulchripinnis</i>,    and <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i>. The former species and <i>H</i>. <i>pulchripinnis</i>    were considered as related to the rosy tetra clade, while <i>H</i>. <i>eques</i>    and <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i> were included in that clade by Weitzman &amp;    Palmer (1997). One of the species also included in that clade is <i>Hyphessobrycon    compressus</i> (the type species of <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>; not analyzed herein).    As noted by Weitzman &amp; Palmer (1997) <i>Hemigrammus</i> has temporal precedence    over <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>, and the latter genus maybe would have to be synonymized    with <i>Hemigrammus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Number    of branched anal-fin rays (288): (0 &gt; 1) 25 or more. (k9-12).</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Bony    hooks on first pelvic-fin ray of adult males (315): (1 &gt; 0) absent. (k9-12).    Reversal of synapomorphy 1 of node 274.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Insertion    of pterotic aponeurosis (340): (0 &gt; 1) on a lobe situated dorsal to horizontal    semicircular canal. (k13-14). Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon bifasciatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hyphessobrycon pulchripinnis</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Contact    between frontals anteriorly to frontal fontanel (21): (0 &gt; 1) present. Reversal    of synapomorphy 4 of node 206. Paralleled in <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Exodon    paradoxus</i>, <i>Galeocharax humeralis</i>, and <i>Odontostoechus lethostigmus</i>.    Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Knodus breviceps</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Fourth    infraorbital (66): (0 &gt; 1) absent or much reduced and bordered posteriorly    by third and fifth infraorbitals. Paralleled in the Aphyocharacinae and Gasteropelecidae,    in node 186, and in <i>Aphyodite grammica</i>, <i>Hasemania nana</i>, <i>Hemigrammus    erythrozonus</i>, <i>Hoplocharax goethei</i>, and <i>Nematobrycon palmeri</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Lateral    coverage of dilator fossa by sixth infraorbital (69): (1 &gt; 0) almost complete,    at least in its ventral border. Paralleled in <i>Stethaprion erythrops</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Number    of cusps of anterior maxillary teeth (139): (0 &gt; 1) five or more cusps. Paralleled    in the Rhoadsiinae, in nodes 273, 283, and 294, and in <i>Bramocharax bransfordii</i>,    <i>Brycon orbignyanus</i>, <i>Gymnocharacinus bergii</i>, <i>Hemibrycon dariensis</i>,    and <i>Odontostoechus lethostigmus</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in node 246.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Relative    length of palatine (172): (0 &gt; 1) distinctly longer than one-half length    of ectopterygoid. Paralleled in nodes 197, 261, and 302 and in <i>Paracheirodon    axelrodi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>6.</b> Number    of gill rakers on first hypobranchial and ceratobranchial (196): (0 &gt; 1)    ten or fewer. Paralleled in the Characinae and in <i>Bryconops melanurus</i>,    <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>, and <i>Moenkhausia sanctaefilomenae</i>. Some    trees: Paralleled in node 196 and in <i>Hemigrammus erythrozonus</i> and <i>Hyphessobrycon    herbertaxelrodi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hemigrammus unilineatus</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Number    of supraneurals (280): (0 &gt; 1) five or more. Reversal of synapomorphy 2 of    node 223. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hasemania nana</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Ventral    extent of third infraorbital (64): (0 &gt; 1) not reaching horizontal arm of    preopercle, at least anteriorly. (k13-14). Reversal of synapomorphy 2 of node    292.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Length    of ascending process of premaxilla (104): (1 &gt; 0) reaching at least one-third    of length of nasal. (k13-14).</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Number    of 2n chromosomes (363): (0 &gt; 1) 52 or more. (k9-12). Paralleled in the Characinae    and Serrasalmidae, in node 196, and in <i>Chalceus macrolepidotus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon    herbertaxelrodi</i>, <i>Markiana nigripinnis</i>, and <i>Rhaphiodon vulpinus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 295: (100    / 100 / 73 / 18)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Hyphessobrycon    eques</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i>, other <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?, some <i>Moenkhausia</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Anterior    region of third infraorbital (63): (0 &gt; 1) abruptly expanded relative to    posterior region of second infraorbital. Paralleled in <i>Pristella maxillaris</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Posterior    margin of cleithrum (234): (1 &gt; 0) without concavity ventral to first postcleithrum.    (k9-12). Reversal of synapomorphy 2 of node 289.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Proximal    and medial radials of anal fins (294): (0 &gt; 1) fused in most pterygiophores.    (k9-12). Paralleled in nodes 184, 208, 218, and 221 and in <i>Psellogrammus    kennedyi</i> and <i>Pseudocorynopoma doriae</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Position    of anal-fin bony hooks of adult males (316): (0 &gt; 2) asymmetrically disposed    and irregularly arranged. (k13-14). Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Pseudotympanum    limited by first pleural rib, <i>lateralis superficialis</i>, second pleural    rib, <i>obliquus inferioris</i>, and <i>obliquus superioris</i> (339): (0 &gt;    1) present. (k9-12). Paralleled in node 234 and in <i>Characidium rachovii</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hyphessobrycon socolofi</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Relative    size of frontal and parietal fontanels (23): (1 &gt; 0) length of frontal fontanel    up to 2/3 length of parietal fontanel. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon    elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Number    of gill rakers on first hypobranchial and ceratobranchial (195): (1 &gt; 0)    16 or more. Paralleled in nodes 177 and 183 and in <i>Astyanax latens</i>, <i>A</i>.    cf. <i>rutilus</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>pelegrini</i>, <i>Hoplias</i> cf. <i>malabaricus</i>,    <i>Moenkhausia dichroura</i>, <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>, <i>Piaractus mesopotamicus</i>,    and <i>Stichonodon insignis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Pectoral-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (310): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in node 268 and in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus</i>    cf. <i>iheringii</i>, <i>B</i>. <i>rubropictus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>,    and <i>Phenacogaster tegatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Dorsal-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (311): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in nodes 248 and 268 and in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>, <i>Nematocharax venustus</i>, and <i>Probolodus    heterostomus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Caudal-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (312): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in node 268 and in <i>Acrobrycon tarijae</i>, <i>Astyanax</i>    cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>Bario steindachneri</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>, and <i>Probolodus heterostomus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hyphessobrycon eques</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Dorsal    end of laterosensory canal of preopercle and suprapreopercle (82): (0 &gt; 1)    overlapping anterodorsal process of opercle. Paralleled in the Alestidae, in    node 230, and in <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>, <i>Pristella    maxillaris</i>, and <i>Stichonodon insignis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Foramen    on articular condyle of quadrate (149): (0 &gt; 1) present. Paralleled in nodes    168, 211, and 231 and in <i>Grundulus cochae</i>, <i>Hasemania nana</i>, and    <i>Lonchogenys ilisha</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Distribution    of denticles on gill rakers (202): (0 &gt; 1) along entire surface of gill rakers.    Paralleled in node 269 and in <i>Astyanax correntinus</i>, <i>Deuterodon langei</i>,    <i>Hoplias</i> cf. <i>malabaricus</i>, and <i>Pristella maxillaris</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Pelvic-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (309): (1 &gt; 0)    absent. Paralleled in <i>Creagrutus anary</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>,    <i>Phenacogaster tegatus</i>, <i>Pseudocorynopoma doriae</i>, and <i>Stethaprion    erythrops</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Markiana nigripinnis</i> and <i>Psellogrammus    kennedyi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 285: (-2    / 53 / - / 1)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genus <i>Paracheirodon</i>;    <i>Hasemania nana</i>, other <i>Hasemania</i>?, <i>Hemigrammus erythrozonus</i>,    other <i>Hemigrammus</i>?, <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>herbertaxelrodi</i>,    other <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Position    of ventral margin of posttemporal (252): (1 &gt; 0) anterior to lateral margin    of epioccipital. Paralleled in nodes 162 and 301 and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>,    <i>Creagrutus anary</i>, <i>Diapoma speculiferum</i>, <i>Moenkhausia</i> cf.    <i>intermedia</i>, and <i>Pyrrhulina australis</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in    node 247 and in <i>Knodus breviceps</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Scales    covering caudal-fin lobes (328): (1 &gt; 0) covering only their base. (k9-12).    Reversal of synapomorphy 2 of node 222.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Paracheirodon axelrodi</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Form    of mesethmoid spine (27): (0 &gt; 1) relatively short, with premaxillae articulating    with each other anterior to mesethmoid. Paralleled in nodes 225 and 234 and    in <i>Chalceus macrolepidotus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Number    of rows of premaxillary teeth (122): (1 &gt; 0) one. Paralleled in node 195    and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>, <i>Carlana eigenmanni</i>, <i>Carnegiella    strigata</i>, <i>Grundulus cochae</i>, <i>Odontostoechus lethostigmus</i>, <i>Piabucus    melanostomus</i>, and <i>Probolodus heterostomus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Relative    length of palatine (172): (0 &gt; 1) distinctly longer than one-half length    of ectopterygoid. Paralleled in nodes 197, 261, and 302 and in <i>Hyphessobrycon    pulchripinnis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Bony    lamella dorsal to fourth basibranchial (185): (0 &gt; 1) absent. Reversal of    synapomorphy 3 of node 203. Paralleled in node 296 and in <i>Axelrodia lindeae</i>,    <i>Gymnocharacinus bergii</i>, <i>Hollandichthys multifasciatus</i>, <i>Mimagoniates    rheocharis</i>, <i>Nematocharax venustus</i>, and <i>Prodontocharax melanotus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Number    of unbranched anal-fin rays (285): (1 &gt; 0) three or fewer. Paralleled in    node 252 and in <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>6.</b> Anterior    articulation of epioccipital bridge (6): (0 &gt; 1) only with parietal. (k12-14).    Paralleled in <i>Grundulus cochae</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>7.</b> Expansion    of lamellar portion of maxilla just posterior to toothed region (97): (0 &gt;    1) very pronounced. (k12-14). Paralleled in node 232 and in <i>Deuterodon langei</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>8.</b> Number    of maxillary teeth (135): (1 &gt; 0) only one, or absent. (k12-14). Paralleled    in the <i>Astyanax</i> clade, in nodes 284 and 290, and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>,    <i>Cheirodon interruptus</i>, <i>Coptobrycon bilineatus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon    bifasciatus</i>, and <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in    <i>Hasemania nana</i> and <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>9.</b> Transitional    vertebrae with haemal canal (229): (1 &gt; 0) present. (k9-11). Paralleled in    nodes 195 and 212, and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>, <i>Engraulisoma taeniatum</i>,    <i>Metynnis maculatus</i>, and <i>Piabina argentea</i>. Some trees: Paralleled    in node 247 and in <i>Bryconamericus alpha</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>10.</b> Dorsal-fin    rays articulating with first dorsal pterygiophore (266): (1 &gt; 0) two. (k12-14).    Reversal of synapomorphy 4 of node 203. Paralleled in <i>Bario steindachneri</i>    and <i>Thayeria obliqua</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>11.</b> Insertion    of pterotic aponeurosis (340): (0 &gt; 2) on pterotic or sphenotic, distinctly    dorsal to horizontal semicircular canal. (k12-14). Some trees: Paralleled in    <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hyphessobrycon herbertaxelrodi</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Number    of maxillary teeth (136): (0 &gt; 1) four or more.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Abrupt    decrease in size of dentary teeth (148): (0 &gt; 1) present.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Ethmopalatine    cartilage (171): (1 &gt; 0) absent or reduced in size.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Process    of scapula forming anterior border of scapular foramen (244): (0 &gt; 1) absent.    Paralleled in nodes 193 and 252 and in <i>Aphyodite grammica</i>, <i>Deuterodon    langei</i>, <i>Hoplias</i> cf. <i>malabaricus</i>, <i>Leporinus striatus</i>,    <i>Odontostilbe paraguayensis</i>, and <i>Thayeria obliqua</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Number    of 2n chromosomes (363): (0 &gt; 1) 52 or more. Paralleled in the Characinae    and Serrasalmidae, in node 196, and in <i>Chalceus macrolepidotus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon    herbertaxelrodi</i>, <i>Markiana nigripinnis</i>, and <i>Rhaphiodon vulpinus</i>.    Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hemigrammus unilineatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>6.</b> Number    of gill rakers on first hypobranchial and ceratobranchial (196): (0 &gt; 1)    ten or fewer. (k12-14). Paralleled in the Characinae and in <i>Bryconops melanurus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon pulchripinnis</i>, <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>, and <i>Moenkhausia    sanctaefilomenae</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in node 196 and in <i>Hemigrammus    erythrozonus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>7.</b> Denticles    on gill rakers (201): (0 &gt; 1) absent. (k9-11). Paralleled in the Gymnocharacinae,    in nodes 245 and 253, and in <i>Axelrodia lindeae</i> and <i>Pseudochalceus    kyburzi</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Nasal    (33): (0 &gt; 1) absent. Paralleled in <i>Coptobrycon bilineatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Length    of laterosensory canal of dentary (79): (0 &gt; 1) reduced or absent. Paralleled    in node 279 and in <i>Aphyocharax nattereri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>, <i>Nantis</i> cf. <i>indefessus</i>, and <i>Thayeria    boehlkei</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Rows    of gill rakers on first ceratobranchial (192): (0 &gt; 1) two. Reversal of synapomorphy    3 of node 179. Paralleled in the Iguanodectinae, in node 280, and in <i>Brycon    orbignyanus</i>, <i>Bryconaethiops macrops</i>, <i>Carlana eigenmanni</i>, <i>Cheirodon    interruptus</i>, <i>Hoplocharax goethei</i>, <i>Odontostilbe microcephala</i>,    <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>, <i>Prodontocharax melanotus</i>, and <i>Rhaphiodon    vulpinus</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in node 249 and in <i>Attonitus ephimeros</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Rows    of gill rakers on second ceratobranchial (193): (0 &gt; 1) two. Paralleled in    nodes 210, 225, 276, and 297 and in <i>Brycon orbignyanus</i>, <i>Hoplocharax    goethei</i>, and <i>Rhaphiodon vulpinus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Anterior    rays of dorsal fin of adult males (268): (0 &gt; 1) elongate and reaching posteriorly    to position close to adipose fin. Paralleled in <i>Pseudocorynopoma doriae</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>6.</b> Relative    size of frontal and parietal fontanels (23): (1 &gt; 0) length of frontal fontanel    up to 2/3 length of parietal fontanel. (k9-11). Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon    socolofi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>7.</b> Maxillary    teeth (134): (1 &gt; 0) absent. (k9-11). Paralleled in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>,    <i>Coptobrycon bilineatus</i>, <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>, <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>,    and <i>Stichonodon insignis</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Psellogrammus    kennedyi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>8.</b> Denticles    on gill rakers (201): (0 &gt; 1) absent. (k9-11). Paralleled in the Gymnocharacinae,    in nodes 245 and 253, and in <i>Axelrodia lindeae</i> and <i>Pseudochalceus    kyburzi</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon herbertaxelrodi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>9.</b> Number    of branched pelvic-fin rays (258): (1 &gt; 0) six or less. (k9-11). Paralleled    in the Aphyocharacinae, in nodes 220, 236, 280, and 302, and in <i>Axelrodia    lindeae</i>, <i>Cheirodon interruptus</i>, <i>Cyanocharax alburnus</i>, <i>Hollandichthys    multifasciatus</i>, <i>Hoplocharax goethei</i>, and <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>.    Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hasemania nana</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>10.</b> Dorsal-fin    rays articulating with first dorsal pterygiophore (266): (1 &gt; 0) two. (k12-14).    Reversal of synapomorphy 4 of node 203. Paralleled in <i>Bario steindachneri</i>    and <i>Thayeria obliqua</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Paracheirodon axelrodi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>11.</b> Bony    hooks on fin rays (307): (1 &gt; 0) absent. (k9-11). Paralleled in the Gymnocharacinae,    in nodes 207, 283, 297, and 301, and in <i>Astyanax paris</i>, <i>Bryconamericus    mennii</i>, <i>Exodon paradoxus</i>, <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, <i>Pseudochalceus    kyburzi</i>, and <i>Rhoadsia altipinna</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hasemania    nana</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>12.</b> Contact    between dorsal margin of <i>adductor mandibulae</i> and ventral margin of <i>dilator    operculi</i> (335): (1 &gt; 0) absent. (k12-14). Paralleled in <i>Creagrutus    anary</i>, <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, <i>Piabucus melanostomus</i>, <i>Prionobrama    paraguayensis</i>, <i>Pristella maxillaris</i>, <i>Prodontocharax melanotus</i>,    and <i>Pyrrhulina australis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>13.</b> Insertion    of pterotic aponeurosis (340): (0 &gt; 2) on pterotic or sphenotic, distinctly    dorsal to horizontal semicircular canal. (k12-14). Some trees: Paralleled in    <i>Paracheirodon axelrodi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hemigrammus erythrozonus</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Fourth    infraorbital (66): (0 &gt; 1) absent or much reduced and bordered posteriorly    by third and fifth infraorbitals. Paralleled in the Aphyocharacinae and Gasteropelecidae,    in node 186, and in <i>Aphyodite grammica</i>, <i>Hasemania nana</i>, <i>Hoplocharax    goethei</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon pulchripinnis</i>, and <i>Nematobrycon palmeri</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Position    of coronomeckelian (110): (0 &gt; 1) situated mainly dorsal to Meckelian cartilage.    Reversal of synapomorphy 2 of node 206. Paralleled in nodes 200, 282, and 290.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Number    of gill rakers on first hypobranchial and ceratobranchial (196): (0 &gt; 1)    ten or fewer. (k12-14). Paralleled in the Characinae and in <i>Bryconops melanurus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon pulchripinnis</i>, <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>, and <i>Moenkhausia    sanctaefilomenae</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in node 196 and in <i>Hyphessobrycon    herbertaxelrodi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hasemania nana</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Ventral    extent of third infraorbital (64): (1 &gt; 0) reaching horizontal arm of preopercle.    Reversal of synapomorphy 3 of node 180. Paralleled in the Heterocharacinae and    Iguanodectinae, in nodes 184, 198, 225, and 302, and in <i>Agoniates anchovia</i>,    <i>Brycon pesu</i>, <i>Markiana nigripinnis</i>, <i>Moenkhausia sanctaefilomenae</i>,    <i>Pseudochalceus kyburzi</i>, <i>Roeboexodon geryi</i>, and <i>Stichonodon    insignis</i>. Some trees: Reversed in node 292.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Fourth    infraorbital (66): (0 &gt; 1) absent or much reduced and bordered posteriorly    by third and fifth infraorbitals. Paralleled in the Aphyocharacinae and Gasteropelecidae,    in node 186, and in <i>Aphyodite grammica</i>, <i>Hemigrammus erythrozonus</i>,    <i>Hoplocharax goethei</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon pulchripinnis</i>, and <i>Nematobrycon    palmeri</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Foramen    on articular condyle of quadrate (149): (0 &gt; 1) present. Paralleled in nodes    168, 211, and 231 and in <i>Grundulus cochae</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon eques</i>,    and <i>Lonchogenys ilisha</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Cartilages    anterior to basihyal (188): (0 &gt; 1) two well developed blocks of cartilage.    Paralleled in nodes 244 and 299 and in <i>Hyphessobrycon bifasciatus</i>, <i>Metynnis    maculatus</i>, <i>Odontostilbe microcephala</i>, and <i>Roeboides descalvadensis</i>.    Some trees: Paralleled in node 265.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Posterior    margin of cleithrum (234): (1 &gt; 0) without concavity ventral to first postcleithrum.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>6.</b> Number    of rays on last anal pterygiophore (291): (0 &gt; 1) one. Paralleled in <i>Coptobrycon    bilineatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>7.</b> Anterior    paired projections of parasphenoid (40): (1 &gt; 0) absent. (k9-11). Paralleled    in <i>Pristella maxillaris</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>8.</b> Number    of maxillary teeth (135): (1 &gt; 0) only one, or absent. (k9-11). Paralleled    in the <i>Astyanax</i> clade, in nodes 284 and 290, and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>,    <i>Cheirodon interruptus</i>, <i>Coptobrycon bilineatus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon    bifasciatus</i>, and <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in    <i>Paracheirodon axelrodi</i> and <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>9.</b> Number    of branched pelvic-fin rays (258): (1 &gt; 0) six or less. (k9-11). Paralleled    in the Aphyocharacinae, in nodes 220, 236, 280, and 302, and in <i>Axelrodia    lindeae</i>, <i>Cheirodon interruptus</i>, <i>Cyanocharax alburnus</i>, <i>Hollandichthys    multifasciatus</i>, <i>Hoplocharax goethei</i>, and <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>.    Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>10.</b> Number    of supraneurals (280): (0 &gt; 1) five or more. (k9-11). Reversal of synapomorphy    2 of node 223. Paralleled in <i>Hemigrammus unilineatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>11.</b> Number    of branched anal-fin rays (287): (1 &gt; 0) 17 or less. (k9-11). Reversal of    synapomorphy 6 of the Characoidea. Paralleled in the Alestidae, in nodes 280    and 290, and in <i>Attonitus ephimeros</i> and <i>Prodontocharax melanotus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>12.</b> Bony    hooks on fin rays (307): (1 &gt; 0) absent. (k9-11). Paralleled in the Gymnocharacinae,    in nodes 207, 283, 297, and 301, and in <i>Astyanax paris</i>, <i>Bryconamericus    mennii</i>, <i>Exodon paradoxus</i>, <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, <i>Pseudochalceus    kyburzi</i>, and <i>Rhoadsia altipinna</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hyphessobrycon    elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 201: (-9    / 82 / - / 1)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Subfamilies Aphyocharacinae,    Aphyoditeinae, Cheirodontinae, Gymnocharacinae, and Stevardiinae; <i>Astyanax</i>    clade, <i>Astyanax paris</i> clade, <i>Bryconamericus scleroparius</i> clade,    and <i>Hyphessobrycon anisitsi</i> clade.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">This node is incongruent    with the hypothesis of Mirande (2009). In that hypothesis the <i>Astyanax</i>    clade included the <i>Astyanax paris</i>, <i>Bryconamericus scleroparius</i>,    and <i>Hyphessobrycon anisitsi</i> clades, as proposed herein. Also the relative    position of the <i>Bramocharax</i> clade of Mirande (2009) is different than    in the present hypothesis.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Dorsal    expansion of rhinosphenoid (48): (1 &gt; 0) absent. Paralleled in nodes 212    and 300 and in <i>Agoniates anchovia</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Tubules    for passage of blood vessels on lamellar portion of maxilla (98): (0 &gt; 1)    tubule with anterior branch running parallel to anterior margin of maxilla and    reaching one third of its length. Paralleled in <i>Tetragonopterus argenteus</i>.    Reversed in node 197. Transformed to state 2 in <i>Markiana nigripinnis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 271: <i>Hyphessobrycon    luetkenii</i> clade (46 / 81 / - / 2)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Astyanax latens</i>,    other <i>Astyanax</i>?, <i>Hyphessobrycon bifasciatus</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>luetkenii</i>,    other <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">The species in    this clade were included in the <i>Astyanax</i> clade in the hypothesis of Mirande    (2009). According to the present hypothesis a new genus should be assigned to    these species, given that the type species of <i>Astyanax</i> (<i>A</i>. <i>mexicanus</i>)    is included in the <i>Astyanax</i> clade, and the type species of <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>    (<i>H</i>. <i>compressus</i>), although not herein analyzed, is presumably included    in the Tetragonopterinae along with the members of the rosy tetra clade of Weitzman    &amp; Palmer (1997). This node is rather stable across the analyses done for    this study, however, its position is variable, lying within the <i>Astyanax</i>    clade in some of them. Thus, both the monophyly and position of this clade should    be further tested.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Posterior    extent of ventral process of quadrate (151): (0 &gt; 1) falling short of posterior    margin of symplectic. Paralleled in the Iguanodectinae, in nodes 284, 289, and    298, and in <i>Astyanax mexicanus</i>, <i>A</i>. cf. <i>rutilus</i>, <i>Aulixidens    eugeniae</i>, <i>Cyphocharax spilotus</i>, <i>Diapoma speculiferum</i>, <i>Hemiodus</i>    cf. <i>thayeria</i>, <i>Metynnis maculatus</i>, <i>Micralestes stormsi</i>,    <i>Moenkhausia sanctaefilomenae</i>, <i>Nematocharax venustus</i>, <i>Probolodus    heterostomus</i>, <i>Psellogrammus kennedyi</i>, and <i>Pseudocorynopoma doriae</i>.    Some trees: Paralleled in node 302.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Astyanax latens</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Abrupt    decrease in size of dentary teeth (148): (0 &gt; 1) present. Paralleled in the    <i>Bryconops</i> clade, in nodes 222, 255, and 299, and in <i>Astyanax paris</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Number    of gill rakers on first hypobranchial and ceratobranchial (195): (1 &gt; 0)    16 or more. Paralleled in nodes 177 and 183 and in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>rutilus</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>pelegrini</i>, <i>Hoplias</i> cf. <i>malabaricus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon    socolofi</i>, <i>Moenkhausia dichroura</i>, <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>, <i>Piaractus    mesopotamicus</i>, and <i>Stichonodon insignis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 294: (76    / 91 / 27 / 11)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Hyphessobrycon    bifasciatus</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>luetkenii</i>, some <i>Astyanax</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Lateral    line (91): (0 &gt; 1) interrupted. Paralleled in nodes 227, 229, 279, and 288    and in <i>Characidium rachovii</i>, <i>Hoplocharax goethei</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon    anisitsi</i>, <i>Moenkhausia sanctaefilomenae</i>, <i>Phenacogaster tegatus</i>,    and <i>Pyrrhulina australis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Canal    of lateral line on caudal-fin membrane (92): (1 &gt; 0) absent. Reversal of    synapomorphy 3 of the Characidae. Paralleled in the Aphyoditeinae and <i>Bryconops</i>    clade, in nodes 227, 229, 244, 287, and 298, and in <i>Aphyocharax nattereri</i>,    <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>, <i>B</i>. <i>thomasi</i>, <i>Charax stenopterus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon anisitsi</i>, <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, and <i>Phenacogaster    tegatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Length    of ascending process of premaxilla (104): (0 &gt; 1) reaching just anterior    end of nasal. Paralleled in node 225 and in <i>Charax stenopterus</i>, <i>Phenacogaster    tegatus</i>, and <i>Stichonodon insignis</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Bryconamericus    agna</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Cusps    of teeth on outer premaxillary row (125): (0 &gt; 1) five or more cusps. Paralleled    in node 265 and in <i>Brycon orbignyanus</i>, <i>Bryconops melanurus</i>, <i>Gymnocharacinus    bergii</i>, <i>Micralestes stormsi</i>, and <i>Nematocharax venustus</i>. Some    trees: Paralleled in <i>Bryconamericus agna</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Number    of cusps of anterior maxillary teeth (139): (0 &gt; 1) five or more cusps. Paralleled    in the Rhoadsiinae, in nodes 273 and 283, and in <i>Bramocharax bransfordii</i>,    <i>Brycon orbignyanus</i>, <i>Gymnocharacinus bergii</i>, <i>Hemibrycon dariensis</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon pulchripinnis</i>, and <i>Odontostoechus lethostigmus</i>.    Some trees: Paralleled in node 246.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Subtemporal    fossa (18): (1 &gt; 0) medially extended to middle exoccipital. Paralleled in    node 211.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Length    of laterosensory canal of dentary (79): (0 &gt; 1) reduced or absent. Paralleled    in node 279 and in <i>Aphyocharax nattereri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>, <i>Nantis</i> cf. <i>indefessus</i>, and <i>Thayeria    boehlkei</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Number    of branched pelvic-fin rays (258): (1 &gt; 0) six or less. Paralleled in the    Aphyocharacinae, in nodes 220, 236, 280, and 302, and in <i>Axelrodia lindeae</i>,    <i>Cheirodon interruptus</i>, <i>Cyanocharax alburnus</i>, <i>Hollandichthys    multifasciatus</i>, and <i>Hoplocharax goethei</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in    <i>Hasemania nana</i> and <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Pelvic-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (309): (1 &gt; 0)    absent. Paralleled in <i>Creagrutus anary</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon eques</i>,    <i>Phenacogaster tegatus</i>, <i>Pseudocorynopoma doriae</i>, and <i>Stethaprion    erythrops</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Markiana nigripinnis</i> and <i>Psellogrammus    kennedyi</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Pectoral-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (310): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in node 268 and in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus</i>    cf. <i>iheringii</i>, <i>B</i>. <i>rubropictus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon socolofi</i>,    and <i>Phenacogaster tegatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>6.</b> Dorsal-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (311): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in nodes 248 and 268 and in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon socolofi</i>, <i>Nematocharax venustus</i>, and <i>Probolodus    heterostomus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>7.</b> Caudal-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (312): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in node 268 and in <i>Acrobrycon tarijae</i>, <i>Astyanax</i>    cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>Bario steindachneri</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon socolofi</i>, and <i>Probolodus heterostomus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>8.</b> Position    of anal-fin bony hooks of adult males (316): (0 &gt; 2) asymmetrically disposed    and irregularly arranged. Some trees: Paralleled in node 295.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hyphessobrycon bifasciatus</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Number    of maxillary teeth (135): (1 &gt; 0) only one, or absent. Paralleled in the    <i>Astyanax</i> clade, in nodes 284 and 290, and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>,    <i>Cheirodon interruptus</i>, <i>Coptobrycon bilineatus</i>, and <i>Iguanodectes    geisleri</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hasemania nana</i>, <i>Paracheirodon    axelrodi</i>, and <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Cartilages    anterior to basihyal (188): (0 &gt; 1) two well developed blocks of cartilage.    Paralleled in nodes 244 and 299 and in <i>Hasemania nana</i>, <i>Metynnis maculatus</i>,    <i>Odontostilbe microcephala</i>, and <i>Roeboides descalvadensis</i>. Some    trees: Paralleled in node 265.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Number    of supraneurals (280): (1 &gt; 0) four or fewer. Paralleled in nodes 211, 223,    and 262, and in <i>Bramocharax bransfordii</i>, <i>Bryconaethiops macrops</i>,    and <i>Nematocharax venustus</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in the Aphyoditeinae.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>4.</b> Insertion    of pterotic aponeurosis (340): (0 &gt; 1) on a lobe situated dorsal to horizontal    semicircular canal. Some trees: Paralleled in node 291.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>5.</b> Second    humeral spot (342): (0 &gt; 1) present as a conspicuous vertical bar. Paralleled    in <i>Gymnocorymbus ternetzi</i> and <i>Tetragonopterus argenteus</i></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 200: (-23    / 80 / - / 1)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Subfamilies Aphyocharacinae,    Aphyoditeinae, Cheirodontinae, Gymnocharacinae, and Stevardiinae; <i>Astyanax</i>    clade, <i>Astyanax paris</i> clade, and <i>Bryconamericus scleroparius</i> clade.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">In the hypothesis    of Mirande (2009) the <i>Astyanax</i> clade included the <i>Astyanax paris</i>    and the <i>Bryconamericus scleroparius</i> clades, differing with the results    herein obtained. As with most of the internal nodes of the distal characids,    this node is rather unstable across the analyses done for this study.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Form    of fourth infraorbital (67): (1 &gt; 0) approximately square or more developed    longitudinally than dorsoventrally. Reversal of synapomorphy 1 of node 189.    Paralleled in 210, 228, 277, and 282. Reversed in node 266. Some trees: Reversed    in nodes 233 and 256.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Position    of coronomeckelian (110): (0 &gt; 1) situated mainly dorsal to Meckelian cartilage.    Reversal of synapomorphy 2 of node 206. Paralleled in nodes 282 and 290 and    in <i>Hemigrammus erythrozonus</i>. Reversed in node 195 and in <i>Astyanax</i>    cf. <i>eigenmanniorum1</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Number    of branched anal-fin rays (288): (1 &gt; 0) 24 or less. Reversal of synapomorphy    5 of the Characidae. Paralleled in nodes 277 and 300 and in <i>Acestrorhynchus    pantaneiro</i> and <i>Iguanodectes geisleri</i>. Reversed in nodes 208, 255,    and 263 and in <i>Bryconamericus scleroparius</i> and <i>Nematobrycon palmeri</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b><i>Astyanax    paris</i> clade</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Astyanax paris</i>,    other <i>Astyanax</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Astyanax paris</i>    is rather dissimilar to other species of <i>Astyanax</i> in the lacking of secondary    sexual bony hooks on the fins of adult males and the possession of several maxillary    teeth. However, these features are not exclusive of this species within <i>Astyanax</i>,    and the position of this species in a different node than the type species of    the genus should be further tested. According to this results, <i>A</i>. <i>paris</i>    should be transferred to a new genus.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Astyanax paris</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Abrupt    decrease in size of dentary teeth (148): (0 &gt; 1) present. Paralleled in the    <i>Bryconops</i> clade, in nodes 222, 255, and 299, and in <i>Astyanax latens</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Bony    hooks on fin rays (307): (1 &gt; 0) absent. Paralleled in the Gymnocharacinae,    in nodes 207, 283, 297, and 301, and in <i>Bryconamericus mennii</i>, <i>Exodon    paradoxus</i>, <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, <i>Pseudochalceus kyburzi</i>, and    <i>Rhoadsia altipinna</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hasemania nana</i> and    <i>Hyphessobrycon elachys</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 199: (-23    / 80 / - / 1)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Subfamilies Aphyocharacinae,    Aphyoditeinae, Cheirodontinae, Gymnocharacinae, and Stevardiinae; <i>Astyanax</i>    clade, and <i>Bryconamericus scleroparius</i> clade.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">This node differs    with the node 200 of Mirande (2009) by the exclusion of the herein defined <i>Hyphessobrycon    luetkenii</i> and <i>Astyanax paris</i> clades and the <i>Bramocharax</i> and    <i>Pseudochalceus</i> clades. This node is supported by a single synapomorphy    of a moderately homoplastic character and is rather unstable across the analyses    made for this paper, as most internal nodes of the distal characids.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Ventral    margin of horizontal process of anguloarticular (109): (0 &gt; 1) perpendicular    to laterosensory canal of dentary from medial view. Paralleled in <i>Bario steindachneri</i>,    <i>Bramocharax bransfordii</i>, and <i>Micralestes stormsi</i>. Reversed in    nodes 195, 280, and 298 and in <i>Attonitus ephimeros</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 267: <i>Astyanax</i>    clade (-9 / 95 / - / 3)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genera <i>Astyanax</i>,    <i>Ctenobrycon</i>?, <i>Markiana</i> Eigenmann, and <i>Psellogrammus</i>; <i>Hyphessobrycon    anisitsi</i> and other <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">This node would    require a subfamilial category according to the hypothesis herein proposed.    However, given the relatively low taxon sampling and some variations obtained    under different searches, an informal provisional name is given to this clade,    pending specific contributions. According to this analysis, this clade is composed    of the genera <i>Astyanax</i>, <i>Markiana</i>, and <i>Psellogrammus</i>, plus    some species currently classified in the genus <i>Hyphessobrycon.</i> The internal    relationships of this clade, however indicate that all species of this node    should be transferred to <i>Astyanax</i>. According to the classical systematics    of the family (Eigenmann, 1917), <i>Hyphessobrycon</i> differs from <i>Astyanax</i>    only by having an interrupted lateral line. Both <i>Hyphessobrycon anisitsi</i>    as <i>H</i>. <i>bifasciatus</i> and <i>H</i>. <i>luetkenii</i>, treated above,    are 
not related with the rosy tetra clade nor even included in the Tetragonopterinae    in the present hypothesis. Some species of <i>Hyphessobrycon</i> not included    in this paper, such as <i>H</i>. <i>auca</i> Almir&oacute;n, Casciotta, Bechara    &amp; Ruiz-D&iacute;az and <i>H</i>. <i>boulengeri</i> (Eigenmann) share certain    overall resemblances with species of this clade and the <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>    clade, but not sufficient to include them in some clade, even putatively. According    to its traditional definition, <i>Ctenobrycon</i> is only distinguished from    <i>Psellogrammus</i> by the presence of a complete lateral line and both genera    share the presence of ctenoid scales (Eigenmann, 1917). Lima <i>et al</i>. (2003)    listed <i>Tetragonopterus correntinus</i> Holmberg and <i>Astyanax pelegrini</i>    as <i>species inquirendae</i> within <i>Ctenobrycon</i>. These species lack    ctenoid scales, and were included in <i>Astyanax</i> by Mirande <i>et 
al</i>.    (2006b). Both <i>A</i>. <i>correntinus</i> and <i>A</i>. <i>pelegrini</i> are    included in this clade, while <i>Ctenobrycon</i> is listed with a question mark    as a probable member of the clade.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Number    of maxillary teeth (135): (1 &gt; 0) only one, or absent. Paralleled in nodes    284 and 290 and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>, <i>Cheirodon interruptus</i>,    <i>Coptobrycon bilineatus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon bifasciatus</i>, and <i>Iguanodectes    geisleri</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in <i>Hasemania nana</i>, <i>Paracheirodon    axelrodi</i>, and <i>Parecbasis cyclolepis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphy    of <i>Astyanax mexicanus</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Posterior    extent of ventral process of quadrate (151): (0 &gt; 1) falling short of posterior    margin of symplectic. Paralleled in the <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i> clade    and Iguanodectinae, in nodes 284, 289, and 298, and in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>rutilus</i>,    <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i>, <i>Cyphocharax spilotus</i>, <i>Diapoma speculiferum</i>,    <i>Hemiodus</i> cf. <i>thayeria</i>, <i>Metynnis maculatus</i>, <i>Micralestes    stormsi</i>, <i>Moenkhausia sanctaefilomenae</i>, <i>Nematocharax venustus</i>,    <i>Probolodus heterostomus</i>, <i>Psellogrammus kennedyi</i>, and <i>Pseudocorynopoma    doriae</i>. Some trees: Paralleled in node 302.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 266: (-9    / 93 / - / 3)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genera <i>Astyanax</i>    (excepting, at least, <i>A</i>. <i>latens</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>mexicanus</i>, and    <i>A</i>. <i>paris</i>), <i>Ctenobrycon</i>?, <i>Markiana</i>, and <i>Psellogrammus</i>;    <i>Hyphessobrycon anisitsi</i>, other <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Form    of fourth infraorbital (67): (0 &gt; 1) longer dorsoventrally than longitudinally.    Reversal of synapomorphy 1 node 200. Some trees: Paralleled in nodes 233 and    256. Reversed in node 260 and in <i>Astyanax troya</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Hyphessobrycon anisitsi</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Lateral    line (91): (0 &gt; 1) interrupted. Paralleled in nodes 227, 229, 279, 288, and    294 and in <i>Characidium rachovii</i>, <i>Hoplocharax goethei</i>, <i>Moenkhausia    sanctaefilomenae</i>, <i>Phenacogaster tegatus</i>, and <i>Pyrrhulina australis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Canal    of lateral line on caudal-fin membrane (92): (1 &gt; 0) absent. Reversal of    synapomorphy 3 of the Characidae. Paralleled in the Aphyoditeinae and <i>Bryconops</i>    clade, in nodes 227, 229, 244, 287, 294, and 298, and in <i>Aphyocharax nattereri</i>,    <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>, <i>B</i>. <i>thomasi</i>, <i>Charax stenopterus</i>,    <i>Inpaichthys kerri</i>, and <i>Phenacogaster tegatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 265: (-9    / 91 / - / 3)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genera <i>Astyanax</i>    (excepting, at least, <i>A</i>. <i>latens</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>mexicanus</i>, and    <i>A</i>. <i>paris</i>), <i>Ctenobrycon</i>?, <i>Markiana</i>, and <i>Psellogrammus</i>;    some <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Cusps    of teeth on outer premaxillary row (125): (0 &gt; 1) five or more cusps. Paralleled    in node 294 and in <i>Brycon orbignyanus</i>, <i>Bryconops melanurus</i>, <i>Gymnocharacinus    bergii</i>, <i>Micralestes stormsi</i>, and <i>Nematocharax venustus</i>. Some    trees: Paralleled in <i>Bryconamericus agna</i>. Reversed in node 261.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Some trees:</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Cartilages    anterior to basihyal (188): (0 &gt; 1) two well developed blocks of cartilage.    (some trees under k9-14). Paralleled in nodes 244 and 299 and in <i>Hasemania    nana</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon bifasciatus</i>, <i>Metynnis maculatus</i>, <i>Odontostilbe    microcephala</i>, and <i>Roeboides descalvadensis</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>No autapomorphies    found for <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>eigenmanniorum2</i>.</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 270: (76    / 93 / 28 / 23)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Astyanax chico</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>endy</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>puka</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>troya</i>, other    <i>Astyanax</i>?, some <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Longitudinal    position of insertion of <i>adductor mandibulae</i> tendon on dentary (330):    (0 &gt; 1) on vertical through middle or anterior half of Meckelian cartilage.    Paralleled in the Iguanodectinae, in nodes 184, 186, 209, 241, and 261, and    in <i>Engraulisoma taeniatum</i> and <i>Gymnocharacinus bergii</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>No autapomorphies    found for <i>Astyanax endy.</i></b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 269: (76    / 96 / 26 / 100)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Astyanax chico</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>puka</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>troya</i>, other <i>Astyanax</i>?, some    <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Distribution    of denticles on gill rakers (202): (0 &gt; 1) along entire surface of gill rakers.    Paralleled in <i>Astyanax correntinus</i>, <i>Deuterodon langei</i>, <i>Hoplias</i>    cf. <i>malabaricus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon eques</i>, and <i>Pristella maxillaris</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>No autapomorphies    found for <i>Astyanax puka</i>.</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 268: (97    / 99 / 83 / 19)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><i>Astyanax chico</i>,    <i>A. troya</i>, other <i>Astyanax</i>?, some <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">The presence of    bony hooks on all fins was cited in the literature for some species of <i>Astyanax</i>,    including <i>A</i>. <i>chico</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>elachylepis</i> Bertaco &amp;    Lucinda, <i>A</i>. <i>hermosus</i> Miquelarena, Protogino &amp; L&oacute;pez,    <i>A</i>. <i>ojiara</i> Azpelicueta &amp; Garc&iacute;a, <i>A</i>. <i>pynandi</i>    Casciotta, Almir&oacute;n, Bechara, Roux &amp; Ruiz-D&iacute;az, <i>A</i>. <i>stenohalinus</i>    Messner, and <i>A</i>. <i>troya</i> (Azpelicueta &amp; Garc&iacute;a, 2000;    Azpelicueta <i>et al</i>., 2002; Bertaco &amp; Lucinda 2005; Casciotta <i>et    al</i>., 2003; Casciotta &amp; Almir&oacute;n, 2004; Miquelarena <i>et al</i>.,    2005). The presence of hooks on all the fins excepting the pectorals was cited    for <i>A</i>. <i>tumbayaensis</i> Miquelarena &amp; Menni by Miquelarena &amp;    Menni (2005). The presence of bony hooks on all the fins excepting the 
caudal    was similarly mentioned for <i>Hyphessobrycon hamatus</i> Bertaco &amp; Malabarba    (Bertaco &amp; Malabarba, 2005). The development or even the presence or absence    of bony hooks on the fins could be variable across the year during different    reproductive stages. Thus, the characters supporting this clade as a monophyletic    unit must be further evaluated across samples collected throughout the year.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphies:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Pectoral-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (310): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>,    <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus</i> cf. <i>iheringii</i>, <i>B</i>.    <i>rubropictus</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i>,    and <i>Phenacogaster tegatus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>2.</b> Dorsal-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (311): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in node 248 and in <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Bryconamericus rubropictus</i>,    <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>, <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i>, <i>Nematocharax    venustus</i>, and <i>Probolodus heterostomus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>3.</b> Caudal-fin    bony hooks in adult males of species bearing hooks on fins (312): (0 &gt; 1)    present. Paralleled in <i>Acrobrycon tarijae</i>, <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>asuncionensis</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>Bario steindachneri</i>, <i>Hyphessobrycon luetkenii</i>,    <i>H</i>. <i>socolofi</i>, and <i>Probolodus heterostomus</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphy    of <i>Astyanax troya</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Form    of fourth infraorbital (67): (1 &gt; 0) approximately square or more developed    longitudinally than dorsoventrally. Reversal of synapomorphy 1 of node 266.    Paralleled in node 260.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>No autapomorphies    found for <i>Astyanax chico</i>.</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 264: (-6    / 87 / - / 3)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genera <i>Ctenobrycon</i>?,    <i>Markiana</i>, and <i>Psellogrammus</i>; <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>abramis</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>asuncionensis</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>correntinus</i>, <i>A</i>. cf.    <i>eigenmanniorum</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>pelegrini</i>,    <i>A</i>. cf. <i>rutilus</i>, other <i>Astyanax</i>?, some <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Relative    size of frontal and parietal fontanels (23): (0 &gt; 1) length of frontal fontanel    3/4 or more of length of parietal fontanel. Reversal of synapomorphy 1 of node    203. Reversed in node 261.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphy    of <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>eigenmanniorum1</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Position    of coronomeckelian (110): (1 &gt; 0) situated mainly lateral to Meckelian cartilage.    Reversal of synapomorphy 2. Paralleled in node 195.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Node 263: (-6    / 90 / - / 3)</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2">Genera <i>Ctenobrycon</i>?,    <i>Markiana</i>, and <i>Psellogrammus</i>; <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>abramis</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>asuncionensis</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>correntinus</i>, <i>A</i>. <i>lineatus</i>,    <i>A</i>. <i>pelegrini</i>, <i>A</i>. cf. <i>rutilus</i>, other <i>Astyanax</i>?,    some <i>Hyphessobrycon</i>?</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Synapomorphy:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Number    of branched anal-fin rays (288): (0 &gt; 1) 25 or more. Reversal of synapomorphy    3 of node 200. Paralleled in nodes 208 and 255 and in <i>Bryconamericus scleroparius</i>    and <i>Nematobrycon palmeri</i>.</font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>Autapomorphies    of <i>Astyanax</i> cf. <i>rutilus</i>:</b></font></p>     
<p><font face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="2"><b>1.</b> Separation    between posterior dentary teeth (147): (0 &gt; 1) more than width of these teeth.    Paralleled in node 221 and in <i>Aulixidens eugeniae</i> and <i>Pristella maxillaris</i>.</font></p>
